      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      close database
      void dropTable(java.lang.String tableName) 
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getBrowserViewInfo()
      returns a map with story_id as a key.The arrayList is a value part of the map, which contains story title as a first element, the rest of the elements are users associated with the given story id
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getChoices(int fragment_id)
      returns choice ids for a given fragment
      java.lang.Integer getFirstFragment(java.lang.String s_id)
      This method will return the fragment is of the first fragment of a story
      java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getFragment(int fragmentId)
      1st element is Fragment title, has type of List, use getFragment(fragmentId).get(0).get(0) to get title as String 2nd element is Fragment users, has type of List 3rd element is fragments' choices, has type of List 4th element is body of the fragment, has type of List, use getFragment(fragment_id).get(3).get(0) to get body as String
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getFragmentIDs()
      returns all fragment ids stored locally
      java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getStory(java.lang.String story_id)
      * returns List of Lists (String) 1st element is Story title, has type of List, use getStory(story_id).get(0).get(0) to get title as String 2nd element is Story users, has type of List 3rd element is 1st fragments' choices, has type of List 4th element is body of the 1st fragment, has type of List, use getStory(story_id).get(3).get(0) to get body as String ATENTION!!! This method assumes that, fragments are ordered.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStoryIDs()
      returns story ids, tested,works
      java.lang.String getTitle(java.lang.String story_id)
      returns title of the story, story_id given
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUsers(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String fOrs)
      id is either story_id or fragment_id, according to the value of fOrs method returns list of users
      void insertIntoChoicesTable(int fragment_id, int choice_id)
      Inserts values into choices table
      void insertIntoFragmentsTable(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String story_id, java.lang.String title)
      Inserts values into fragments table
      void insertIntoImagesTable(int image_id, java.lang.String pointer, boolean isAnnotation, int fragment_id)
      Inserts values into images table if isAnnotation==true, then photo is annotation, 1 is inserted into the is_annotaion column if isAnnotation==false, then photo is part of the fragment, 0 is inserted into the is_annotaion column
      void insertIntoStoriesTable(java.lang.String storyId, java.lang.String title)
      inserts values into stories table
      void insertIntoUsersTable(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String story_id, int fragmentId, java.lang.String fOrS)
      Inserts values into users table, If the user is author of story, insert 0 into fragment_id column, If user is author of fragment, insert '0' into story_id column
      LocalStorageController openForRead()
      open database for read
      LocalStorageController openForWrite()
      open writable database
      int setFragment(java.lang.String story_id, java.lang.String fragmentTitle, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String fragmentBody, int prevFragmentId)
      Inserts fragment body, story id, fragment title into fragments table Inserts user to users table.
      void setStory(java.lang.String storyId, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String user)
      Stores title, story_id into stories table Stores user to stories table.

      • getStory

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getStory(java.lang.String story_id)
        * returns List of Lists (String) 1st element is Story title, has type of List, use getStory(story_id).get(0).get(0) to get title as String 2nd element is Story users, has type of List 3rd element is 1st fragments' choices, has type of List 4th element is body of the 1st fragment, has type of List, use getStory(story_id).get(3).get(0) to get body as String ATENTION!!! This method assumes that, fragments are ordered. That is, first fragment of the given story is above all other fragments of that story
        Parameters:
        story_id -
        Returns:
        List> storyInfo

      • setStory

        public void setStory(java.lang.String storyId,
            java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String user)
        Stores title, story_id into stories table Stores user to stories table. Third argument is 0, which identifies that author of story is inserted
        Parameters:
        title -
        userStory -

      • setFragment

        public int setFragment(java.lang.String story_id,
              java.lang.String fragmentTitle,
              java.lang.String user,
              java.lang.String fragmentBody,
              int prevFragmentId)
        Inserts fragment body, story id, fragment title into fragments table Inserts user to users table. If previous fragment id is not 0, inserts current fragment as a choice for the previous fragment
        Parameters:
        story_id -
        fragmentTitle -
        user -
        fragmentBody -
        prevFragmentId -
        Returns:
        current Fragment id

        Parameters:
        fragmentId -
        Returns:
        List> fragment
